definitions.example: The convention was held in Geneva.

definitions.definition: A formal deliberative assembly of mandated delegates.
definitions.example: The EU installed an inter-institutional Convention to draft a European constitution.

definitions.definition: The convening of a formal meeting.
A formal agreement, contract or pact.
A treaty or supplement to such.
definitions.example: The Vienna convention at the Vienna Congress (1814-15) standardized most of diplomatic conduct for generations.

definitions.definition: A practice or procedure widely observed in a group, especially to facilitate social interaction; a custom.
definitions.example: Table seatings are generally determined by tacit convention, not binding formal protocol.
